info.description: A TechStore e-commerce API built with Go
info.title: TechStore API

get.description: Retrieve all addresses for the current user

post.description: Create a new address for the current user

get.description: Retrieve a specific address by ID

post.description: Authenticate user and return JWT tokens
Get new access token using refresh token

get.description: Retrieve a specific brand by ID

delete.description: Remove all items from the cart

post.description: Add a product to the current user's cart

put.description: Update the quantity of an item in the cart

delete.description: Remove an item from the cart

get.description: Retrieve a specific category by ID
Retrieve all orders for a specific user

404.description: No orders found for this user

get.description: Retrieve a specific order by ID

post.description: Create a new payment record (User/Admin only)
Handle the callback from a payment gateway (e.g., Momo, VNPay)

get.description: Retrieve the status of a payment
Retrieve a specific product by ID

post.description: Add an image to a product (Admin only)
Create a new user account (Admin only)

get.description: Retrieve a specific user by ID (Admin only)

models.SwaggerCartItem.description: Cart item model for Swagger documentation

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
